text: Alien Hominid Invasion is a 2023 run and gun video game developed by The Behemoth. it is a sequel/reimagining of The Behemoth 2004 video game Alien Hominid == Gameplay == Alien Hominid Invasion is a side-scrolling roguelike shooter with exp leveling and loot mechanics. == Plot == The game starts with a alien called Alien Hominid, the Fat Kid licked a ice cream and the FBI stepped on it and toke it then, a alien invastion starts coming. == Development == The Behemoth did live streams on there devlopement over time and released a some videos and update and diaries and a closed beta demos over time. ==References== Category:2023 video games Category:Indie video games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Video games about alien invasions Category:Video games about extraterrestrial life Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Video game sequels Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games
title: Alien Hominid Invasion
